title: Clutter Free
description: Minimalism is the key to a happier life. But you must be willing to let go of your possessions.
quote: I love this sweater, but I do not wear it anymore. And itâ€™s making such a mess, I want to scream.
altHero: Serenity Spruce giving a kind smile
alt1: Serenity hugging a sweater and crying
alt2: Serenity throwing the sweater into a wall-sized incinerator
alt3: Serenity smiling calmly in front of huge flames
alt4: Serenity with a man who has removed his hat to reveal super long red hair
